shaders.shader:
<psShader program = "
	
	Texture2D gDiffuseMap : register(t0);
	Texture2D depthMap : rigister(t10);
	SamplerState samLinear : register(s0);
	
	struct VertexOut
	{
		float4 PosH  : SV_POSITION;
		//float4 Color : COLOR;
		float2 UV : TEXCOORD0;
		float2 DepthUV : TEXCOORD1;
		float depth : TEXCOORD2;
	};
	
	float4 PS(VertexOut pin) : SV_TARGET
	{
		float4 diffuse = gDiffuseMap.Sample(samLinear, pin.UV);
		float depth = depthMap.Sample(samLinear, pin.DepthUV);
		
		float color = float4(0.5, 0.5, 0.5, 1.0);
		if (pin.depth < depth)
		  color = diffuse;
		  
		return color;
	}"
	/>
